BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.7.0.931 Feature: Select the Parkingspot inside of BTI. To activate this feature, you must download the Database File for the Parking Positions seperatly from Flightsim.to BTI will calculate Position and Heading for you.
Maint: Full re-work of True and Magnetic Heading for spawn. Maint: Re-work to prepare the Events & Trigger Editor for the next steps.
